               Description of the input parameters for BLACK_BODY:
               ===================================================

TITLE:   Information title

TEMPERATURE [K]: The emitter temperature in Kelvin

MIN ENERGY [eV]:  Minimum photon energy for the calculated spectrum, in eV.

MAX ENERGY [eV]:  Maximum photon energy for the calculated spectrum, in eV.

NUMBER OF POINTS: Number of energy points for the energy spectra
